author: Benzinga Sports Insights
title: Celtics vs. Pistons NBA Game Time, TV Channel & Live Stream – December 28 - Benzinga
text:
Loading... Loading... The Detroit Pistons (2-28) will try to end a 27-game losing streak when they visit the Boston Celtics (23-6) at 7:30 PM ET on Thursday, December 28, 2023 at TD Garden. The game airs on NBA TV, NBCS-BOS, and BSDET.
How to Watch Celtics vs. Pistons Date: Thursday, December 28, 2023 Time: 7:30 PM ET How to Watch on TV: NBA TV, NBCS-BOS, and BSDET Location: Boston, Massachusetts Venue: TD Garden Live Stream: Watch this game on Fubo! Boston's 2023-24 Stats Stat Rank Field Goal % 48% 10 Opp. Field Goal % 44.8% 4 Rebounds Per Game 47 2 Opp. Rebounds Per Game 42.9 10 Turnovers Per Game 12.4 9 Opp. Turnovers Per Game 11.6 29 Watch ESPN originals, The Last Dance and more NBA content on ESPN+!
